editor_name: QV3-P3-协助骑士团并取得其信任
name: Aid the Order and gain its trust
desc: Complete quests given by the Union or events to progress towards the Stage Goal. Complete Stage Goals to receive rewards.
treasure_desc: You can randomly obtain various valuable rewards

editor_name: QV3-P4-完成十字路口攻城战

desc: Follow the storyline to help the Order finish the battle of Crossroads Keep.
treasure_desc: You can randomly obtain various valuable rewards

editor_name: （废弃）QV3-P1-获得大家的认可
name: 获得大家的认可
desc:
帮助佣兵团的同伴和小镇居民可以获得进度值
达成目标值后可获得阶段目标奖励
treasure_desc: 可以随机获得各类优质奖励

editor_name: 共通线-第二章：骑士团声望达标（临时版本）
name: Gain 100 Reputaion with the Union
desc:
When Reputation reaches 100, the Order will reinforce at critical moments.
Reputation can be increased by completing various events and quests. The choices you make during these events will also affect Reputation.
treasure_desc: You can randomly obtain various valuable rewards

editor_name: QV3-P5-调查港都真相
name: Investigate the truth of Waverun City
desc: Follow the storyline to join Gloria and investigate the truth of Waverun City.
treasure_desc: You can randomly obtain various valuable rewards

editor_name: QV3-P6-完成第二次十字路口会战
name: End the Crossroads Battle II
desc: Follow the storyline to help the Order finish the Crossroads Battle II.
treasure_desc: You can randomly obtain various valuable rewards

editor_name: QV3-P7-歌洛莉亚的救赎
name: Save Gloria
desc: Save Gloria from trouble together with your friends in your mercenary group.
treasure_desc: You can randomly obtain various valuable rewards

editor_name: QV3-P7-完成最终决战
name: Complete the final battle
desc: Follow the storyline to help Lutfi take down Waverun City.
treasure_desc: You can randomly obtain various valuable rewards

editor_name: （废弃）AT1-加强小镇防御
name: 抵御即将到来的敌袭
desc:
附近不少村子遭到山贼袭击，背后似乎隐藏着巨大危机，得尽快加强小镇防御
完成右下角带特殊图标的事件战斗、事件委托，即可提高阶段目标的完成度

editor_name: 共通线-第一章：维持小镇稳定
name: Maintain stability in the town
desc: Receive refugees and various incoming factions and maintain stability in the overcrowded town.
treasure_desc: You can randomly obtain various valuable rewards

editor_name: 共通线-第二章：任意势力声望到达标
name: Selected Faction Reputation Reaches 100
desc: Look into various factions to seek inspiration for the future of the town. Reputation can be increased by completing various events and quests. The choices you make during these events will also affect Reputation.
treasure_desc: You can randomly obtain various valuable rewards
